name: Elements (Andrew Klinge)
description:
A simple sandbox game clone where you can select and manipulate various elements, which have unique properties and interact in interesting ways.

It currently has 10 elements to choose from:

  • air: bounces around off other elements.
  • anti: the same as air, but erases another element upon collision and then disappears.
  • flame: short-lived, rises, and can ignite flammable elements.
  • smoke: slowly sinks, created when elements are burned. Disappears after a while and has a chance to form ash.
  • ash: slowly falls to the ground.
  • dirt: affected by gravity. Was planned for being used to grow plants.
  • wood: unaffected by gravity and is flammable.
  • fuse: similar to wood only is more flammable and burns much faster.
  • water: a liquid! It fills its container, splashes, and allows other elements to sink through it.
  • plant: a living solid, will grow and produce more of itself. Requires water to grow more. Is flammable.
Controls
  • LEFT MOUSE BUTTON: place element
  • SCROLL WHEEL: change selected element
  • RIGHT MOUSE BUTTON: remove element
